phrases: Fear Me!! Freeza Does Battle With a Third Transformation
That little one should not have such a battle power.
After recovering from near-death, it is as if he is a different person altogether.
The little one is a Saiyan!
Twenty years ago, with the exception of Vegeta, Nappa and Raditz,
the Saiyans were supposed to have been exterminated.
He does not look like either Vegeta or Nappa...
There is something there that reminds me of him.
T- That blast that just got bounced back...
I put everything I had into that, and it still did not connect against Freeza!
He is indisputably drawing closer to becoming a Super Saiyan.
You must have figured it out!
After coming one step away from death,
when we Saiyans recover, our strength increases!
Before Freeza makes his final transformation, you must render me half-dead!
The blood of the Saiyans must be completely cut off.
Not because I believe in ridiculous legends, such as the Super Saiyan, history's greatest warrior,
but because I do not feel well with them around.
It is the principle of it all, with the little one and Vegeta growing stronger so quickly.
If I injure myself, there will be no effect!
B- But my power is not enough to bring you to near-death!
I will lower my battle power as low as it will go.
We are just lucky that Namekian kid down there can heal people instantaneously.
No matter how much I may hate you, how can I?
Besides which, it is just about time for Goku to recover.
He will not get any stronger than that!
It would be a simple matter to blow you all to pieces in this current form,
but before I kill you, I will have you witness the terror of an ultimate power, even more frightening than death!
I do you a great service!
You will experience a terror even greater than that of Hell's.
And so, gaze upon my final transformation!
If you do it now, there is still time.
What is wrong with this planet?
I am going to die here!
If I would known Son-kun was coming, I could have left searching for the Dragonballs up to him!
Am I going to get out of here in time?
You have to shoot a stronger Ki!
Cannot you even do that, you good-for-nothing fool!?
I am at last going to become... a Super Saiyan...
W- Why did Kuririn-san shoot Vegeta?
I cannot say that I am...
It is all right, we can heal those injuries!
There is a Namekian named Dende that can heal injuries!
You say you cannot heal me?
You are saying you could heal the others, but not me?
You killed many of my friends as well!
I cannot heal someone like that!
So long as you do not heal me, Freeza will not be beaten!
I am starting to lose consciousness...
I am going to save the other one.
Vegeta and the other Saiyans gain a whole lot of strength once revived from near death.
You knew that, did not you?
And so, he had me blast him on purpose.
It sounded like he was sure he could beat Freeza!
They said... you can heal injuries.
I see, so that is it!
Do I have the same ability?
You, like Nail-san, are a warrior-type.
More importantly, Dende, I know how you feel, not wanting to heal Vegeta.
For now, without him, there is not anything we can do!
He is also killed so many Namekians!
I can beat Vegeta now, but I cannot possibly beat Freeza.
All this time, we should have masked our Ki and hidden somewhere.
If we had done something like that, he would just blow us away, planet Namek and all!
He does not have any more use for this planet!
T- That is one impossibly huge Ki.
T- The incredible beast is about to appear!
You just be grateful that I did not kill you right here!
So that is Freeza's battle power?
Looks like he is revealed his true self.
Freeza, or anyone else, bring it on!
I have now become a Super Saiyan!
At last, Freeza completes his third transformation.
Is there any hope left for Gohan and the others?
